top_comment.text:

KUDOS TO ALL CHI REBELS SINCE 2006﻿
top_comment.author: Alicia Banks

comments.text:
amen!
ditto!
kudos to all of us chi rebels!

comments.author: Alicia Banks

comments.text: Kudos to you Black Woman, I stand for the CHI, Lupe' and not for POTUS!
comments.author: milesdevlon

top_comment.text:
I would take Lupe more seriously, if he actually voted.  Useless.   More of 
the same stupidity.  Yapping, but not even voting...utterly worthless.﻿
top_comment.author: Vik Dylan

comments.text:
+Dik Villain Sheep. I feel bad for you if you really think that voting 
makes a difference.  In my own state (Arizona) they always set it up so the 
same people win every year, even though more than 50% of the state are 
against what people do.  Politicians have enough money to buy elections, 
they don't need nor care about the people. It doesn't matter what the law 
says, that never stopped anyone from breaking it.
comments.author: Nyx Gypsy

comments.text:
+Kat The Artist (Empress Libra) There are other parties that exist besides 
your beloved two parties.  Check out the Libertarian and Green Parties. 
 You don't seem very bright.   Nor motivated.  How's welfare working out 
for you?
comments.author: Dik Villain

comments.text:
He's not voting because it's pointless. Anyone who thinks that their 
actually vote counts is an idiot -.- The government knows exactly who 
they're going to put in the office. Why the fuck would they let civilians 
choose?? You must be very, very stupid..
comments.author: Kat The Artist (Empress Libra)
